textBeforeTable: The List You can also list your job on the Jobs page. Please contact the person below, if you have a position or contract work you would like to hire someone to do. This list is not intended to be used to ask for free support. Instructions for Employers See the Jobs page for jobs already posted to this site. Linux experts are encouraged to provide their information in the table below so that companies may contact them for their areas of interest. Please put an expiration date for the information, so we can remove information when it gets stale. Or even better, when you have obtained work, please remove your entry from this table. This page is intended to provide a place for Embedded Linux Experts to advertise their availability, and describe their expertise, to companies interested in paying them for services. This could include contract work or fulltime employment. Instructions for Experts Rusty_Russell_Quotes This page is here in honor of Rusty Russell, one of the funniest Linux kernel developers EVER Embedded Linux Expert List 2 The List 1.2 Instructions for Employers 1.1 Instructions for Experts 1 Embedded Linux Expert List Contents
